price: 43. Ma gaaladiinnan baa ka khayr badan kuwaas mise waxaad heysataan cafis idiinku qoran Kutabahayaga?
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulāikum am lakum barāatun fī al-zuburi
